languages.text: {n}Звуки раздраженных голосов разносятся по отсекам корабля. Лейтенант блюстителей Аврилла Вент преграждает дорогу облаченной в броню Мастеру дисциплины и, судя по интонациям и лицам, — ситуация накалялась уже давно, а сейчас достигла пика.{/n}

{n}The sounds of a heated discussion reverberate through the ship's bays. Lieutenant Avrilla Vent of the ship's enforcers is barring the path of her superior, Master-at-Arms Jocasta Sauerback, who has arrived clad in armour. Judging by their expressions and tone, the standoff has dragged on for some time already and has now reached boiling point.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Звуки раздраженных голосов разносятся по отсекам корабля. Лейтенант блюстителей Аврилла Вент преграждает дорогу облаченной в броню Мастеру дисциплины и, судя по интонациям и лицам, — ситуация накалялась уже давно, а сейчас достигла пика.{/n}

languages.text: {n}船舱中回荡着激烈的争吵声。执法者阿芙里拉·温特中尉拦住了她的上级——身披重甲的戒律大师，约卡斯塔·苏尔贝克本人。从她们的表情和语气来看，这场对峙已经持续了一段时间，双方都已经到了一触即发的状态。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sounds of a heated discussion reverberate through the ship's bays. Lieutenant Avrilla Vent of the ship's enforcers is barring the path of her superior, Master-at-Arms Jocasta Sauerback, who has arrived clad in armour. Judging by their expressions and tone, the standoff has dragged on for some time already and has now reached boiling point.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}船舱中回荡着激烈的争吵声。执法者阿芙里拉·温特中尉拦住了她的上级——身披重甲的戒律大师，约卡斯塔·苏尔贝克本人。从她们的表情和语气来看，这场对峙已经持续了一段时间，双方都已经到了一触即发的状态。{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: {n}El ruido de una discusión acalorada resuena por las bahías de la nave. La teniente Avrilla Vent de los guardias de la nave bloquea el paso de su superior, la maestra de armas Jocasta Sauerback, que ha aparecido con la armadura puesta. A juzgar por sus expresiones y su tono, llevan ya un tiempo en punto muerto y están a punto de explotar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sounds of a heated discussion reverberate through the ship's bays. Lieutenant Avrilla Vent of the ship's enforcers is barring the path of her superior, Master-at-Arms Jocasta Sauerback, who has arrived clad in armour. Judging by their expressions and tone, the standoff has dragged on for some time already and has now reached boiling point.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El ruido de una discusión acalorada resuena por las bahías de la nave. La teniente Avrilla Vent de los guardias de la nave bloquea el paso de su superior, la maestra de armas Jocasta Sauerback, que ha aparecido con la armadura puesta. A juzgar por sus expresiones y su tono, llevan ya un tiempo en punto muerto y están a punto de explotar.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: {n}艦内ベイに激しい議論の声が響く。艦内エンフォーサーのアヴリラ・ヴェント副官が、アーマーに身を包んだ上司のマスター・アット・アームズ、ジョカスタ・ザウアーバックの行く手を阻んでいる。彼らの表情や口調から判断するに、この睨み合いはすでにしばらく続いており、今や臨界点に達しているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sounds of a heated discussion reverberate through the ship's bays. Lieutenant Avrilla Vent of the ship's enforcers is barring the path of her superior, Master-at-Arms Jocasta Sauerback, who has arrived clad in armour. Judging by their expressions and tone, the standoff has dragged on for some time already and has now reached boiling point.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}艦内ベイに激しい議論の声が響く。艦内エンフォーサーのアヴリラ・ヴェント副官が、アーマーに身を包んだ上司のマスター・アット・アームズ、ジョカスタ・ザウアーバックの行く手を阻んでいる。彼らの表情や口調から判断するに、この睨み合いはすでにしばらく続いており、今や臨界点に達しているようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: {n}Die Geräusche einer hitzigen Diskussion hallen durch die Buchten des Schiffs. Lieutenant Avrilla Vent von den Enforcern des Schiffs versperrt ihrer Vorgesetzten, Waffenmeisterin Jocasta Sauerback, den Weg, die in voller Rüstung eingetroffen ist. Ihren Blicken und ihrem Tonfall nach zu urteilen stehen sie sich schon länger so gegenüber und die Situation nähert sich dem Siedepunkt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sounds of a heated discussion reverberate through the ship's bays. Lieutenant Avrilla Vent of the ship's enforcers is barring the path of her superior, Master-at-Arms Jocasta Sauerback, who has arrived clad in armour. Judging by their expressions and tone, the standoff has dragged on for some time already and has now reached boiling point.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Geräusche einer hitzigen Diskussion hallen durch die Buchten des Schiffs. Lieutenant Avrilla Vent von den Enforcern des Schiffs versperrt ihrer Vorgesetzten, Waffenmeisterin Jocasta Sauerback, den Weg, die in voller Rüstung eingetroffen ist. Ihren Blicken und ihrem Tonfall nach zu urteilen stehen sie sich schon länger so gegenüber und die Situation nähert sich dem Siedepunkt.{/n}
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: {n}Les éclats de voix d'une conversation houleuse se font entendre à travers les cloisons du vaisseau. La lieutenante des prévôts Avrilla Vent barre la route de sa supérieure, la capitaine d'armes Jocasta Sauerback, toute de métal bardée. À en juger par leur ton et leur expression, la confrontation dure depuis un petit moment déjà, et la situation est sur le point de dégénérer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sounds of a heated discussion reverberate through the ship's bays. Lieutenant Avrilla Vent of the ship's enforcers is barring the path of her superior, Master-at-Arms Jocasta Sauerback, who has arrived clad in armour. Judging by their expressions and tone, the standoff has dragged on for some time already and has now reached boiling point.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Geminin bölmelerinde hararetli bir tartışmanın yankıları duyuluyor. Gemi infazcılarından Teğmen Avrilla Vent, zırhlara bürünmüş olan üstü Silahtar Jocasta Sauerback'in yolunu tıkıyor. İfade ve tonlamalara bakılırsa sinirler öyle bir gerilmiş ki her an bir şey patlak verebilir.{/n}

Judging by their expressions and tone, the standoff has dragged on for some time already and has now reached boiling point.{/n}
